pc_extras_clocks.description: Clocks tied to PC extras, artifact awakening, and persistent consequences created mid-session.

khagar_bitter_mercy_awakening.name: Bitter Mercy Awakening
khagar_bitter_mercy_awakening.description: Tracks the Spear of Bitter Mercy waking up as Khagar proves worth through hunts and consequences inflicted.
advancement_triggers: Inflict a consequence with Bitter Mercy (+1)
Take out a worthy named foe in a hunt context (+1)
Accept a compel driven by Hircine / the Spear (+1)
Spare or 'end mercifully' a worthy prey via concession (+1)

unlocks.2: Level 2: Add once-per-scene 'Huntsman's Sting' (declare truth about prey's weakness if you have their scent/trace).
unlocks.4: Level 3: Bitter Mercy aspect begins with +1 free invoke at scene start when you declare a hunt.
unlocks.6: Level 4 (Awakening 6): Apex Predator (free stunt tied to Bitter Mercy) + clarify Bitter Mercy synergy as Weapon:+1 vs 'Bitter Mercy' marked prey (max Weapon:3 total).

legate_rikke_sanies_lupinus_incubation.name: Rikke — Sanies Lupinus Incubation
legate_rikke_sanies_lupinus_incubation.description: Tracks infection progression after Khagar's bite to Rikke's hand during her concession escape.
story_hooks: 1/4: Fever dreams + wound won't heal cleanly; paranoia spikes.
2/4: Heightened senses + aggression; secrecy increases; investigates 'what bit me.'
3/4: First partial shift under stress; Thalmor attention risk rises sharply.
4/4: Full crisis: Rikke must choose suppression, cure-hunt, or embrace (GM fork).

thalmor_scent_scry_escalation.name: Thalmor — Scent-Scry Escalation
thalmor_scent_scry_escalation.description: Daedric artifact pulses + predator rites create 'anomalies' that can be triangulated by Thalmor diviners over time.
advancement_triggers: Use Bitter Mercy in a high-profile scene (+1)
Named Imperial survives and reports 'the monster' (+1)
Thalmor agent witnesses a hunt rite (+2)
setback_triggers: Kill or misdirect a Thalmor informant (-1 to -2)
thalmor_scent_scry_escalation.completion_effect: A Thalmor operative cell is dispatched with a tailored counter-plan (silver, fire, propaganda).
thalmor_scent_scry_escalation.completion_note: Completed during Session 02: Khagar's public werebear transformation in Cloud District triggered Thalmor divination escalation.

galmar_resentment.name: Galmar's Resentment
galmar_resentment.description: Internal hardliner friction within Stormcloak command; Galmar resents 'mercy' choices and Khagar's influence.
story_hooks: 2/4: Galmar mutters complaints; tension building
3/4: Open confrontation; demands explanation
4/4: Crisis point - Galmar challenges authority or demands removal

khagar_werebear_evolution.name: Khagar — Werebear Evolution
khagar_werebear_evolution.description: Khagar's lycanthropy evolves through use, control, and Hircine's favor.
advancement_triggers: Feed Hircine's hunger via worthy hunt (+1)

unlocks.2: Enhanced senses persist in humanoid form
unlocks.4: Primal Avatar - full mastery + new stunt option

whiterun_witnesses_huntress_targeted.name: Whiterun Witnesses: The Huntress Targeted
whiterun_witnesses_huntress_targeted.description: Civilians and guards witnessed Khagar engage Aela the Huntress; rumors spread about the confrontation.
story_hooks: 1/4: Witnesses spread rumors; 'He fought Aela'
2/4: Companions hear; questions about confrontation
3/4: Aela's reputation tied to outcome; polarizes Companions
4/4: Companions demand explanation or issue challenge

whiterun_civilians_protected.name: Whiterun Civilians: 'He Protected Us'
whiterun_civilians_protected.description: Khagar established evacuation corridor to Temple of Kynareth; civilians remember mercy during siege.
advancement_triggers: Public acts of restraint vs collateral (+1)
story_hooks: 1/4: Gratitude whispered; counterweight to beast fears
2/4: Witnesses speak openly; 'not just a monster'
3/4: Danica offers sanctuary/support
4/4: Whiterun civilians become allies despite occupation

companions_notice_aelas_bow.name: Companions Notice: Aela's Bow
companions_notice_aelas_bow.description: Companions are aware Khagar has Aela's Hunting Bow; implications for honor and standing.
story_hooks: 1/4: Companions hear Aela's bow was taken
2/4: Inner Circle asks questions; tension rises
3/4: Formal challenge or demand for explanation
4/4: Resolution required - return, keep, or contest

aela_hunt_debt.name: Aela — Hunt-Debt
aela_hunt_debt.description: Aela the Huntress owes Khagar a Hunt-debt after conceding and being released under oath.
story_hooks: 1/3: Debt acknowledged; Aela withdrawn to Jorrvaskr
2/3: Debt called or honored; major assistance
3/3: Debt fulfilled - new relationship dynamic established
